main event: On 14 July 1959, an unidentified light was observed moving across the sky in New Delhi, India.
interesting points: The light was brighter and larger than any star or conventional airplane observed., The object was seen at a high rate of speed., It suddenly accelerated and disappeared quickly., The observer was a captain and deemed reliable., There was no evidence of any conventional aircraft or satellites in the area at the time.
sighted object: an unidentified light in the sky
